22aa5142-0da4-4351-89bf-f3543954e0d3: Unify all sites, extendable so that we can add mores sections in the future.
dc4a186f-2c98-4ef8-8573-e4be776c1361: A Proposal For An Online Bookstore
d9742b7d-e380-4866-a87f-2619a4e65a8d: A Proposal for an Online Bookstore
9fde92b4-8aba-4d27-b1eb-77922c87eeda: This is a proposal to bring all the existing Kautilya websites under a single unified brand. A single website that manages all of your books, authors and media. The site can easily be extended to include new sections for different kinds of information services, a new media section or a institute of public policy.
a60e444d-a6ba-4e8f-ae4a-6324b340e8d9: The homepage has 4 clear sections. The top section contains a carousel of upcoming books or book syou want to highlight. The next section is all your entire catalogue. It can be filtered by language or organised by popularity or chronologically.
feb8fe92-3cc6-4922-be54-6925be4ca605: Below the catalogue is a carousel with each of your authors. The footer contains a link to download the entire Kautilya catalogue in pdf format for offline reference and sharing.
bb8aad51-f3fa-4ebf-9d97-715811d6d012: Each book page contains book details, a collection of book reviews and links to other recommended books. The BUY NOW button redirects users to the amazon product page for each book. The links to recommended books can either be other books in the Kautilya catalogue or they can be affiliate links to similar books on amazon.
03980c50-007f-4aa4-a1f3-539efc33bd44: The reviews depicted here are curated reviews that we add to the site If you would like anybody to be able to leave a review for a book this functionality can be added as an optional additional cost in the pricing section at the end.
563be456-6526-4afd-83d5-5498256dc283: Each writer has a page with a bio and personal information along with a list of all the book they have published with Kautilya.
\n 8774edf6-d32b-4f23-9278-96428723: Each of the person information sections are option, not entering data in a specific field simply removes that section from the interface.
32f04b77-1f11-48fc-ab0f-8bd648511d6b: As the catalogue grows it will become increasingly important to be able to search for different groups of books. The proposed search page allows you to filter the catalogue by genre, author or keyword. The results can then be organised by language, date published or popularity (as measured by page views to a book page).
cc634128-6ce9-42e7-99ab-e5a83c3cf5c1: This page is optional. The current catalogue is small enough to be navigated without search. This is more pre-emptive and you can reduce the cost of the project by removing this page.
0fa85a6d-998f-4566-b397-e79957fcba4c: The news page contains all the link from the current Kautilya site as well as all the links on the Kautilya Newtwork website. Each video links to a page with a single video to make it easy to share individual posts. All of the content is currently hosted on youtube and will continue to be in the new design.
83853a1a-3a9a-4b96-b476-8608f3a2cb54: If you would also like to be able to create text based posts we can connect the website to a content management platform like contentful or wordpress where writers can publish new posts. I have included this as an additional cost in the pricing section below.
cca4d477-9528-462c-92fc-660378cff17f: The contact page is background of the Delhi address, along with the address in writing and contact numbers.
ab0e0819-bc73-4522-b226-b2099e046cdd: If you would like to add any more information to the contact page it can easily be included.
6bf47700-8a7d-4b61-b44f-51c0d1013381: The site u until now is not configurable. Making changes to the catalogue will involve updating the database manually. This is not overly technical and can be done by someone who does not know how to code. That said if you would like the content to be anybody I have prepared the following administrator section to edit content.
4b42708f-ddb1-485e-886e-749b0101519f: The link to the login page in not accessible anywhere on the site It is only for administrators.
\n: You can add, update or remove book from the catalogue.
f1706881-4abe-49e4-b81f-85580bfab45b: translation, etx post on  contently or wordpress.
bc9ed894-8937-4b54-9660-661ea82bd844: for $100 you can have a new site, but no search and you still need to contact me every you want to add or edit a book as it need sto be done manually from teh backed. $ for 3250 you have can have a fully featured , multilingual web pltform for kautilya.
